parameters.name: All
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to delete all tags. Valid values:

*   **true**
*   **false**

Default value: **false**

parameters.name: ResourceId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource. Valid values of N: **1** to **50**.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description: The type of the resource. Set the value to **DOMAIN**.

parameters.name: TagKey
parameters.description: The key of the tag. Valid values of N: **1** to **20**.
